home.title: Welcome to the Galleria mellonella Platform
home.subtitle: A collaborative space to share, learn, and disseminate knowledge about Galleria mellonella. Here, knowledge is built in community.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a platform dedicated to the dissemination and exchange of knowledge about Galleria mellonella, a widely used invertebrate model in scientific research. We have a collaborative network of faculty, students, researchers, and experts, with the goal of connecting people and ideas around this invertebrate

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to be a reliable source of knowledge and resources for the scientific community and those interested in Galleria mellonella. We aim to promote collaboration among researchers and drive scientific research forward.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to become the leading global reference for information and resources related to Galleria mellonella. We aspire to be recognized as a center of excellence, connecting researchers, academics, and enthusiasts interested in this species. We seek to promote significant advancements in understanding immunology, microbiology, and other research areas through the study of Galleria mellonella. We aim to be a platform that inspires and empowers the scientific community, driving innovation and the development of solutions for complex challenges.
